Text: Request for Courtesy CopiesAll Appearances on the Gas Industry Restructuring Service List I Dear Sir or Madam MRW Associates Inc is assisting multiple clients by monitoring the Gas Industry Restructuring GIR proceeding Dr Robert B Weisenmiller a principal of our firm has already been placed on the service list in the Information Only category Although not an Appearance Dr Weisenmiller respectfully requests receiving from you courtesy copies of all testimony and pleadings you submit in this case including rebuttal testimony due May Email service is preferred Testimony and pleadings in this case may be sent to Robert B Weisenmiller PhD MRW Associates Inc Harrison Street Suite Oakland CA Please note that this is the same information already listed on the Information Only portion of the current service list Thank you in advance for your cooperation Sincerely s G Alan Comnes G Alan Comnes Senior Project Manager cc Administrative Law Judge Andrea Biren G Alan Comnes MRW Associates Inc Harrison Street Suite Oakland CA wwwmrwassoccom fax
